channel.title: Karmascape (Just an advertise - play if you feel it)
channel.description:
[img]http://i1127.photobucket.com/albums/l637/ashstar45/karmaban1.jpg[/img] [center]Hey guys, Host ash here from karmascape.[/center] [center]Karmascape has been online for 2 weeks now after the previous ddos attacks and i would love if you guys could give it a try![/center] [center]What's so fun about karmascape? well let me tell you :3! <3[/center] [size=12pt][center]VPS HOSTED![/center]
[center]I've spent seven months making karmascape a great friendly community! :D![/center] [center]Great home, Great environment, great donation rewards[/center] [center]Easy to earn items, easy to kill bosses, safespotting...[/center]
[center][img]http://i1127.photobucket.com/albums/l637/ashstar45/Screenshot_1-1.png[/img][/center] [center][img]http://i1127.photobucket.com/albums/l637/ashstar45/9Gn6EHF.png[/img][/center] [center][img]http://i1127.photobucket.com/albums/l637/ashstar45/Screenshot_2-1.png[/img][/center] [center][img]http://i1127.photobucket.com/albums/l637/ashstar45/qGTyrje.png[/img][/center] [center][img]http://i1127.photobucket.com/albums/l637/ashstar45/Screenshot_3.png[/img][/center] [center][size=18pt]Come play now![/size][/center] [center][url=http://www.rswebclients.com/play/Karmascape%2024-7]www.rswebclients.com/play/Karmascape%2024-7[/url][/center]

item.title: Karmascape (Just an advertise - play if you feel it)
item.dc:creator: @Thevodkastudios Thevodkastudios
item.description:
@Thevodkastudios wrote:

Seven months… lawl.

Other then that…

Could attract a younger age group considering how easy leveling would be.

Read full topic
